name: Infinicities
description:
A city building game where you will find a relaxing and at the same time challenging experience. The game will focus on city management. The idea is the freedom to develop your own city, without building limits, did you run out of space? Just buy one more plot of land. But be aware, money doesn't grow on trees! In the game and you will need to manage your finances well, and keep an eye on the traffic, as the number of inhabitants and vehicles tends to increase significantly and congestion can literally stop your city, stopping deliveries, travel, making you lose money, and eventually losing the game.

This is a personal project of mine, gamedev has been a good hobby for me, so don't expect me to finish it anytime soon. But I will share updates here.
